99.2% of Somali females have what is known as type III FGM

Lets look at what that is exactly 

> Type III Female Genital Mutilation (FGM), also called infibulation, is the most severe and invasive form of FGM. 

**Type III FGM (Infibulation)**

It involves removing all of the external clitoris and labia (usually the labia minora and the inner/outer portions of the labia majora).

After the tissue is removed, the remaining skin is pulled together and stitched, creating a seal that covers most of the vaginal opening.

A small hole is intentionally left (or unintentionally remains) to allow urine and menstrual blood to pass.

The fused area may later be cut open for intercourse or childbirth, and in some cultures it may be re-sewn afterward.


........

As someone who uses LLM often for work, it's obvious to me, but to show everyone else I just Ctrl+F'd through the last couple days of his comments and here's some obvious examples. Mods, do you care about your site being botted?

Firstly, em dashes everywhere is hilariously obvious, but also his constant use of "it's not this, it's that" is a surefire indicator to anyone that's not retarded. AI also overuses phrases like "last refuge". He generates these multi paragraph essays just seconds after the previous comment.

>That is not faith. That is cowardice with a crucifix sticker.

>That isn’t trolling. That’s the survival instinct of someone who knows he’s out of his depth and sinking.

>That isn’t populism. That’s spiritual anemia disguised as rebellion.

>You are not defending the faith. You are LARPing as a prophet while serving the same dull,

>You are not speaking truth to power. You are blaming a foreign country

>Your reaction is not critique—it’s flinching.

>You are not clever. You are the embodiment of bad-faith theater

>You are not a defender of God. You are a charlatan shouting into an empty echo chamber.

>You are not exposing anything. You are publicly demonstrating the intellectual limits

>Your loyalty is not courage. It is dependency.

>Calling it AI slop is the last refuge of someone who cannot answer a single sentence

>“Learn English” is the refuge of someone who cannot handle

>Your accusation of “payment” is your final refuge, the soft blanket clutched by someone

>It is the last refuge of someone who has nothing left.

>Instead you cling to the weakest refuge ever devised: “You cannot point out my collapse because you are not human.”

>Now you retreat into the last refuge of the spiritually inverted:

As someone who uses LLM often for work, it's obvious to me, but to show everyone else I just Ctrl+F'd through the last couple days of his comments and here's some obvious examples. Mods, do you care about your site being botted?

Firstly, em dashes everywhere is hilariously obvious, but also his constant use of "it's not this, it's that" is a surefire indicator to anyone that's not retarded. AI also overuses phrases like "last refuge". He generates these multi paragraph essays just seconds after the previous comment.

That is not faith. That is cowardice with a crucifix sticker.

That isn’t trolling. That’s the survival instinct of someone who knows he’s out of his depth and sinking.

That isn’t populism. That’s spiritual anemia disguised as rebellion.

You are not defending the faith. You are LARPing as a prophet while serving the same dull,

“Learn English” is the refuge of someone who cannot handle

Your accusation of “payment” is your final refuge, the soft blanket clutched by someone

It is the last refuge of someone who has nothing left.

Instead you cling to the weakest refuge ever devised: “You cannot point out my collapse because you are not human.”
